title: Relinquishment no bar to jurisdiction
context: ยง436B-22 Relinquishment no bar to jurisdiction. The forfeiture, nonrenewal, surrender, or voluntary relinquishment of a license by a licensee shall not bar jurisdiction by the licensing authority to proceed with any investigation, action, or proceeding to revoke, suspend, condition, or limit the licensee&rsquo;s license or fine the licensee. [L 1991, c 111, pt of ยง2; am L 1992, c 202, ยง18]
